title: Animations and spell effects disappearing in game - must reconnect
body:
<>

Frequently in my games suddenly all spell effects will disappear from the game, I cant see any attacks or abilities making it unplayable.

However, I can still chat and new messages still come in, I can still move, I can still attack and cast spells because I can see hp bars and mana bars going down. I see all the champions teleporting or sliding around. When my hp bar hits 0, I can no longer move.

This issue is only fixed by leaving and reconnecting to the game, although it may happen again in the same game. it usually happens in bunches, where it would happen once in a few games in a row, or many times in the same game forcing me to quit. Then again, sometimes I go 10 games in a row without incident.

I have tried changing all settings to lowest, and checking on a different server, problem persists. I un- and re-installed LoL, nothing. I thought the new client would fix it, nothing.

Does this happen to anyone else?

replies.body: This sounds like you've got a weak connection issue or maybe packet loss that's failing to transmit information smoothly.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and really know for sure.  Let me know what you find!

Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not.
